es.csic.iiia.nsm

Class NormSynthesisMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.csic.iiia.nsm.NormSynthesisMachine

  • public class NormSynthesisMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    The Norm Synthesis Machine (NSM), containing:
    1. The norm evaluation dimensions (effectiveness and necessity). During the norm evaluation phase, norms are evaluated in terms of their: (i) effectiveness, based on the outcome of their compliances, and (ii) necessity, based on the outcome of their infringements;
    2. The configuration settings of the norm synthesis machine;
    3. The monitor, containing sensors to perceive the scenario;
    4. The normative network, whose nodes stand for norms and whose edges stand for relationships between norms;
    5. The omega function, that computes the normative system from the normative network;
    6. The norm synthesis strategy, which contains a method execute() that performs the norm synthesis cycle;
    7. The domain functions dmFunctions that allow to perform norm synthesis for a specific domain.
    8. The NSM metrics, that contains information about the metrics of different elements in the norm synthesis process.
    Author:
    "Javier Morales (jmorales@iiia.csic.es)"

      • NormSynthesisMachine

        public NormSynthesisMachine(NormSynthesisSettings settings,
                            PredicatesDomains predDomains,
                            DomainFunctions dmFunctions,
                            boolean gui,
                            long randomSeed)
        The Norm Synthesis Machine constructor.
        Parameters:
        settings - basic settings of the norm synthesis machine
        predDomains - the predicates and terms to specify norms for the given domain
        dmFunctions - the domain functions, that allow to perform norm synthesis for a specific domain
        gui - indicates if the user requires a GUI or not
        See Also:
        PredicatesDomains, DomainFunctions

      • executeStrategy

        public NormativeSystem executeStrategy(double timeStep)
                                throws IncorrectSetupException
        Performs the norm synthesis cycle by executing the norm synthesis strategy
        Returns:
        the NormativeSystem resulting from the norm synthesis cycle. The normative system is computed by the omega function, from the normative network
        Throws:
        IncorrectSetupException
        See Also:
        NormSynthesisStrategy, NormativeSystem

      • checkSetup

        private void checkSetup()
                 throws IncorrectSetupException
        Checks the initial setup of the norm synthesis machine, ensuring that the user has added sensors to perceive the scenario, an omega function to compute the normative system from the normative network, and a norm synthesis strategy
        Throws:
        IncorrectSetupException - if one of the following conditions hold: (1) no sensors have been added to the monitor; or (2) no omega function has been set; or (3) no strategy has been set
        See Also:
        IncorrectSetupException

        Adds a default normative system (i.e., a pool of norms that will be active in the normative network)
        Parameters:
        poolOfNorms - the pool of active norms in the normative network
